about_the_game:
Become an epic cube in this 3D platformer puzzle game. This game is about finding the cheesiest way to solve a level. Glitch yourself through platforms so you fly up high in the air or find secret paths in levels. It is up to you to find out! It is about finding smart ways to solve a level. Don't expect high end, smooth and polished mechanics like other 3D platformers. This game is clumsy and sometimes unexpected which is part of the magic.

Tutorial and level 1, 2 ,3, 11, 12, 13, 21, 22, 23 available with the corresponding achievements,

Try this when you:
- like a challenge
- like collecting stuff
- like weird games


If you want to be part of the development, feel free to join our discord server.

highlighted.name: Great, you broke the game D:

name: CheeseCube Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64bit)
  • Processor: 1.5Ghz or better
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible, ATI, Nvidia or Intel HD
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: 2Ghz or better
  • Memory: 6 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible, ATI, Nvidia or Intel HD
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible sound card
